subject: Football
Pro Bowl
lead_paragraph: Undefeated Carolina led the N.F.L. with 10 players — including quarterback Cam Newton, picked for the third time — selected for the Pro Bowl, set for Jan. 31 in Honolulu.
snippet: Undefeated Carolina led the N.F.L. with 10 players — including quarterback Cam Newton, picked for the third time — selected for the Pro Bowl, set for Jan. 31 in Honolulu.
